did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Original illustrations and prepress proofs of cartoon art. Comic strips represented include the Berrys, Bi-focals, the Bungle Family, Cicero's Cat, the Flintstones, Grafitti, Gunther, Heathcliff, the Jackson Twins, Joe Palooka, Mickey Finn, Mutt and Jeff, Sal A. Mander, Sparky Watts, Stoker, This Funny World, and Yogi Bear. Also includes releases compiled by McNaught Syndicate.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Original illustrations and prepress proofs of cartoon art. Comic strips represented include the Berrys, Bi-focals, the Bungle Family, Cicero's Cat, the Flintstones, Grafitti, Gunther, Heathcliff, the Jackson Twins, Joe Palooka, Mickey Finn, Mutt and Jeff, Sal A. Mander, Sparky Watts, Stoker, This Funny World, and Yogi Bear. Also includes releases compiled by McNaught Syndicate.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Cartoon art collection, #8030. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Series I. Cartoon Art, Prints, and Releases
Subseries Ia. The Berrys by Carl Grubert
45 original drawings. Originals of The Berrys weekly strip from 1945, unsigned.

scopecontent.p: Carl Grubert begins signing his name to the strips on August 8, 1946.
Colored proofs of The Berrys weekly strip from 1946, small size, some are undated, but all are filed in order by date by being matched with the originals.
Colored proofs of The Berrys weekly strip, large size, undated but from August-September 1946 based on originals.

did.unittitle: Subseries Ib. Bi-Focals by Ruth Marcus

scopecontent.p: 9 original drawings, Sunday strips, some hand-colored by artist.
4 original drawings, Sunday strips, some hand-colored by artist

Subseries Ig. Graffiti by Bill Leary

scopecontent.p: 62 original single panel daily strips, many written not drawn, includes paste-up of similar strip called Bumper Sticker, set of numbered backgrounds for Graffiti, undated panels of Graffiti, some of which may be from 1968 and before based on topical references to political figures, Chicago convention, election, etc.

did.unittitle: Subseries Im. Mutt and Jeff by Al Smith

scopecontent.p: 90 original daily strips, phone messages from Bill Olsen, Helena Norman, and Bruce Frazer written on back of March 23 strip.
37 original Sunday strips, one strip missing glued on additions.

did.unittitle: Subseries In. Red Ryder by Fred Harman
Subseries Io. Sal A. Mander by Chris Gassett
Subseries Io. Sparky Watts by Boody Rogers

scopecontent.p: 5 original drawings. Original drawings of Sparky Watts by Boody Rogers, 5 pages of what may either be an issue of Sparky Watts or a segment of Sparky Watts in Big Shot Comics. There is no date, but it was found in a box of proofs from the mid-1940s. These pages are not in any of the proofs of Big Shot Comics or Sparky Watts included in the box of proofs.
